title: Textile, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: mordant painted and dyed and resist dyed (chintz) on plain weave
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Glazed chintz with offset columns of Persian cone shapes made up of delicate flowers and leaves; polychrome on very dark blue ground.
